spectrometer_mass/name.documentation:
=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: spectrometer_mass/name
IDS: spectrometer_mass
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 1
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 2
PARENT_CONTAINER: spectrometer_mass
FIELD_NAME: name
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: spectrometer_mass -> name

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Short string identifier (unique for a given device)

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[spectrometer_mass]: Mass spectrometer diagnostic

spectrometer_mass/channel/validity.documentation:
=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: spectrometer_mass/channel/validity
IDS: spectrometer_mass
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 2
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 3
PARENT_CONTAINER: spectrometer_mass/channel
FIELD_NAME: validity
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: spectrometer_mass -> channel -> validity

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Indicator of the validity of the data. 0: Valid from automated processing; 1: Valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; -1: Problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO); -2: Invalid data, should not be used. (Values less than -2 have a code-specific meaning)

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[spectrometer_mass]: Mass spectrometer diagnostic
CONTAINER[spectrometer_mass/channel]: Set of mass channels, each corresponding to a given atomic mass measured continuously by the spectrometer

spectrometer_mass/channel/validity_timed.documentation:
=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: spectrometer_mass/channel/validity_timed
IDS: spectrometer_mass
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 2
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 3
PARENT_CONTAINER: spectrometer_mass/channel
FIELD_NAME: validity_timed
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: spectrometer_mass -> channel -> validity_timed

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Indicator of the validity of the data for each time slice. 0: Valid from automated processing; 1: Valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; -1: Means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO); -2: Invalid data, should not be used. (Values less than -2 have a code-specific meaning.)

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[spectrometer_mass]: Mass spectrometer diagnostic
CONTAINER[spectrometer_mass/channel]: Set of mass channels, each corresponding to a given atomic mass measured continuously by the spectrometer
